name: Guessthelanguage
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the language
des:
Listening to an audio record, you have to guess the language from multiple choices. It will start easy but questions will get harder.

Supported Language:
 - arabic
 - finnish
 - german
 - hindi
 - italian
 - korean
 - norwegian
 - portuguese
 - filipino
 - french
 - greek
 - indonesian
 - japanese
 - mandarin
 - polish
 - russian
 - spanish

Every language audio extract is from CBC public broadcasting service, used for entertainment and educational purpose only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
